member.name: P:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageImageableArea
member.summary: Gets an object that represents the area of a page that the printer can use.
member.returns: A object that specifies the distance, in pixels (units of 1/96 inch), of the upper-left corner of the imageable area. The vertical distance is measured from the top edge of the paper and the horizontal distance is measured from the left edge. The return value also specifies the width and height of the imageable area. If the printer driver does not report an imageable area, then this property is null.
